ComicInfo.Series: Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - The Journey Begins
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s nooses and Not-Men for Roland when the last gunslinger and his faithful billy bumbler enter the positively medieval Kingstown. But gallows and the invisible thugs that fill their knots are the least of Roland’s worries, as a face long consigned to a burned Charyou tree rises from the ashes…
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-14 12:55:38. [CVDB230931]
